#summary Notes on getting started

= Getting started =

With Maven:

*Maven Integration for Eclipse*( http://m2eclipse.codehaus.org/ )

You can install the Maven Integration for Eclipse by using the following update site from within Eclipse:

 http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/update/

Stable development builds can be installed from separate update:

 http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/update-dev/


*Subclipse* ( http://subclipse.tigris.org/install.html )

Update site:
 * Name: Subclipse 1.4.x (Eclipse 3.2+)
 URL:  http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.4.x

 * Name: Subclipse 1.2.x (Eclipse 3.2+)
 URL:  http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.2.x

 * Name: Subclipse 1.0.x (Eclipse 3.0/3.1)
 URL:  http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.0.x
